Intel | Intel Inspires

Client:

Intel

Agency:

American Video Game League

Project Length:

8 Months

Scope:

Creative Direction

"Incredible to meet students so engaged in their esports programs and meeting all of the educators supporting their students' endeavors."
- Aaron Bellot, Remnants

The Challenge

Intel Inspires is one of the largest scholastic esports events. With an eight-month tournament series culminating in a live championship, it needed a cohesive identity that matched its scale. Beyond competition, the event had to drive brand engagement, career development, and lead generation for Intel and partners.

The Solution

A Unified Identity for Scholastic Esports

From social promos to event signage, we adapted Intelâ€™s corporate branding into a true esports identity, modular enough to integrate partner brands like ASUS, CDW, and SHI while maintaining a unified and modern design system for screens of all sizes.

A Pathway to Success

We built Intel Inspires to be a structured pathway for high school and college players to compete, network, and gain visibility from the start. The summit was designed to not only showcase top talent but also to educate and connect students with industry professionals and recruiters.

Competition & Career Development

With a three-day LAN championship and industry summit, we delivered a dual experienceâ€”high-energy esports alongside thought leadership panels and networking sessions, so players and educators could leave with meaningful insights and career opportunities.

The Impact

ðŸ“Š 10,000+ students from 478 schools participated, with $30K in grants awarded to winning teams.

ðŸŽ¥ 2.7M+ social impressions, driving engagement across Intel and partner channels.

ðŸ“ˆ 223 educators attended, generating 403 unique leads for partner brands.
